channel.title: Delete item variable
channel.description:
ok so what I was trying to do was if a player had a certain item it would get completely deleted on death like no dropped but completely removed, So I think I came up with a way to do this but I need to know a variable to have an item deleted. like for example
c.deleteitem(###, #) like something like that but is a recognized variable, So please help!
